branding.tagline: This Block provides a comprehensive overview of all cost and performance data for one or multiple BQ projects, enabling users to effectively monitor BigQuery usage down to a per user level. It can be used to set up alerts to long running or high cost queries.

CONNECTION_NAME.label: Connection Name
CONNECTION_NAME.description: The connection that houses your BQ Optimization data.

SCHEMA_NAME.label: Schema Name
SCHEMA_NAME.description: The schema name of your BQ Optimization data.

AUDIT_LOG_EXPORT_TABLE_NAME.label: Audit Log Export Table Name
AUDIT_LOG_EXPORT_TABLE_NAME.description: The table name of your BQ Optimization data (should be a single table with JSON columns).

CONFIG_PROJECT_NAME.label: Config Project Name
CONFIG_PROJECT_NAME.description: (Will be autogenerated; leaving placeholder comment for now)
